name: Joy (Mars3)
description:
For the Pippin Barr game Jam, based on the idea of

░ GAME IDEA
░░
░ JUMPING
░░
░ BUT IT'S ONLY
░ JUMPING
░ FOR JOY
░░
░ YOU DON'T GET TO
░░ GO ANYWHERE
░░░ OR SEE ANYTHING
░░░░ OR KILL ANYONE

Spent 4 hours making the first edition, which I lost to a drive failure, so I made this one with more features in about an hour.
